name: ModelDebugOptionsComponent.VisualizationMode
desc: A mode that specifies the portion of the rendering process to isolate and display for debugging.

items.name: case none
items.desc: A mode that doesn’t display a visualization.

items.name: case normal
items.desc: A mode that displays the normal vectors as a color.

items.name: case tangent
items.desc: A mode that displays the surface tangent vectors as a color.

items.name: case bitangent
items.desc: A mode that displays the surface bitangent vectors as a color.

items.name: case baseColor
items.desc: A mode that displays the entity’s base color with no lighting or material properties applied.

items.name: case textureCoordinates
items.desc: A mode that displays the texture coordinates as a color.

items.name: case finalColor
items.desc: A mode that displays the entity’s calculated color, ignoring transparency.

items.name: case finalAlpha
items.desc: A mode that displays the entity’s calculated transparency as its surface color.

items.name: case roughness
items.desc: A mode that displays the shininess of a material as the surface color.

items.name: case metallic
items.desc: A mode that displays the reflectiveness of an entity as its surface color.

items.name: case ambientOcclusion
items.desc: A mode that displays the calculated ambient occlusion value as the surface color.

items.name: case specular
items.desc: A mode that displays en entitiy’s shininess as its surface color.

items.name: case emissive
items.desc: A mode that displays the emissive channel of a material as the surface color.

items.name: case clearcoat
items.desc: A mode that displays the clearcoat channel of a material as the surface color.

items.name: case clearcoatRoughness
items.desc: A mode that displays the clearcoat roughness channel of a material as the surface color.

items.name: case lightingDiffuse
items.desc: A mode that displays the intensity of indirect light hitting the entity as its surface color.

items.name: case lightingSpecular
items.desc: A mode that displays the intensity of direct light hitting the entity as its surface color.

items.name: init?(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Initializes a visualization mode from a raw string value.

items.name: var rawValue: String
items.desc: The corresponding value of the raw type.

items.name: typealias ModelDebugOptionsComponent.VisualizationMode.RawValue
items.desc: The datatype used for raw values.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Passes a visualization mode’s raw value to the specified hash function.

items.name: static func != (ModelDebugOptionsComponent.VisualizationMode, ModelDebugOptionsComponent.VisualizationMode) -> Bool
items.desc: Compares two values to see if they aren’t equal.
